name: Balance of Souls
description:
In this game you play a spirit who awakens to a strange tug at their soul--a call bringing them from the afterlife to Earth after a long absence. As this spirit, you learn that this call is coming from your childhood friend, Ronnie, who's now much older than when you last saw him. How, or why, you were brought to him, you will have to find out.

Music by DaveJf on freesound.org
